pullRequest.title: MAPFAIL Produces a Semantic Error in HANDLE CONDITION
pullRequest.bodyText:
ANTLR parser was changed accordingly.
Closes #668
Signed-off-by: Anton Grigorev anton.grigorev@broadcom.com

nodes.bodyText: AFAIR. CONDITION is obligatory here. The previous implementation was incorrect.

commit.message:
fix: MAPFAIL Produces a Semantic Error in HANDLE CONDITION

ANTLR parser was changed accordingly.
RECEIVE MAP conditions was added.

Closes #668

Signed-off-by: Anton Grigorev <anton.grigorev@broadcom.com>
